original_text: Jacob continued to say to Joseph, ‘You have two sons that were born to you in Egypt before I came here. They will become my own sons. Ephraim and Manasseh will be my sons, just as Reuben and Simeon are my sons.
korean_text: 내가 애굽으로 와서 네게 이르기 전에 애굽에서 네가 낳은 두 아들 에브라임과 므낫세는 내 것이라 르우벤과 시므온처럼 내 것이 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: Jacob continued to say to Joseph
that were born to you in Egypt
They will become my own sons
Ephraim and Manasseh will be my sons
sentences.korean_translation: 에브라임과 므낫세는 내 아들이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: just as Reuben and Simeon are my sons
